text: Circle USD 375 is a public unified school district headquartered in Towanda, Kansas, United States. The district includes the communities of Towanda, Benton, Greenwich, Midian, western El Dorado, eastern Bel Aire, and nearby rural areas. ==Schools== The school district has six schools: * Circle High School * Circle Middle School * Circle Benton Elementary School * Circle Greenwich Elementary School * Circle Oil Hill Elementary School * Circle Towanda Elementary School ==See also== * Kansas State Department of Education * Kansas State High School Activities Association * List of high schools in Kansas * List of unified school districts in Kansas ==References== ==External links== * Category:School districts in Kansas
title: Circle USD 375
